metadata.title: CVE-2018-10115 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Incorrect initialization logic of RAR decoder objects in 7-Zip 18.03 and before can lead to usage of uninitialized memory, allowing remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted RAR archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-10115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

p7zip-rar - 16.02-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: p7zip-rar package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '16.02-3').
